h1_title: Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish
h2_title: Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish Boss Fight and Guide
content: You'll see the Yin-Yang Fish rear itself up from the water and spray a jet at you, or flip itself up and over, to try and hit you with a tail flick. Staying close to it will stop it from being able to hit you with the jet spray, but will make it more likely to try and tail-whip you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Keeper_of_the_Flaming_Mountains_and_Yin-Yang_Fish.md', within the main section titled 'Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish', specifically from the subsection 'Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Missable Transformation Spell'.
The content is as follows:
You'll see the Yin-Yang Fish rear itself up from the water and spray a jet at you, or flip itself up and over, to try and hit you with a tail flick. Staying close to it will stop it from being able to hit you with the jet spray, but will make it more likely to try and tail-whip you.
